snippet.title: Heroes of Mount Dragon Annoucement Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the shoes of one of 8 unique heroes who can transform into powerful dragons! Whether you’re teaming up with friends or battling solo, prepare for fast-paced, side-scrolling combat against hordes of enemies. With intuitive controls and a deep set of moves, you’ll face off in epic battles, unleash devastating combos, and unlock powerful upgrades as you progress.

*Launching in June 2025!*

Please wishlist us on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2733070/

Try our demo on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3488130/

Join our Discord server:
https://discord.gg/SMv6qUB8Rq

#games #indiegame #competitive #brawler
